welcome_message_body: "Welcome to DeSoto, where charm and southern hospitality meet! Our city is known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that DeSoto has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by Southwest Airlines for their flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and international flights for Air Canada, Aeromexico, and Avianca.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for American Airlines, Qantas, and other Oneworld alliance members.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport provides services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport caters to private and corporate jets.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.
